\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename Teta, typename Trho, typename Tp$>$\newline
struct emsr\+::coulomb\+\_\+t$<$ Teta, Trho, Tp $>$}

This struct captures the state of the Coulomb functions at a given order and argument. 

Definition at line 475 of file specfun\+\_\+state.\+h.
